Candy Bar Copycat

CANDY BAR COPYCAT: PROTEIN TWIX

A three-layered protein bar that tastes just like a Twix, but with 17g of protein.

17g
Protein
270
Calories
35m
Total Time
12
Yield

Nutrition per 1 bar

Carbs22g
Fat17g
Fiber3g
Sugar14g
DifficultyMedium

INGREDIENTS

  • 120g almond flour
  • 60g vanilla whey protein powder
  • 60g coconut oil, melted
  • 120g sugar-free caramel sauce
  • 150g dark chocolate chips

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Make the shortbread layer

In a bowl, combine the almond flour, protein powder, and melted coconut oil. Press into a lined loaf pan and bake at 175¬∞C (350¬∞F) for 10 minutes.

2

Cool the base

Let the shortbread layer cool completely.

3

Add the caramel layer

Pour the sugar-free caramel sauce over the cooled shortbread layer.

4

Freeze

Place the pan in the freezer for 30-60 minutes, until the caramel is firm.

5

Melt chocolate

Melt the dark chocolate chips in the microwave.

6

Coat the bars

Cut the chilled mixture into bars and dip each bar in the melted chocolate. Place on a parchment-lined plate and refrigerate until the chocolate is set.

PRO TIPS

üí°

Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 5 days.

üí°

For best results, use a kitchen scale to measure ingredients in grams.

üí°

Let cool completely before storing to prevent sogginess.
